title: dashboard: github projects with https-scheme do not get associated in the packages-view
body:
by **karatepekka**: 
Github projects with https-scheme that are added to the package dashboard are not
associated properly in the packages-view.

For example the project go-socket.io that has an address
https://github.com/madari/go-socket.io is
shown properly in the projects view, but in the packages view it is not associated with
the corresponding
description.
